metadata.title: USN-4539-1 -- AWL vulnerability
metadata.description: Andrew Bartlett discovered that DAViCal Andrew's Web Libraries (AWL) did not properly manage session keys. An attacker could possibly use this issue to impersonate a session. (CVE-2020-11728)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4539-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  awl-doc - 0.60-1+deb10u1ubuntu1 libawl-php - 0.60-1+deb10u1ubuntu1 No subscription required
